WorkItem.Description:
The Rawr.Addon /rawr export function will give "Night Elf" for a character race, which results in an error in Rawr, saying "Night Elf" is not recognized. Removing the space from the Addon export text fixes the issue.
 
== Error Message ==
There is an error in XML document (1, 203).
Instance validation error: 'Night Elf' is not a valid value for CharacterRace.
 
== StackTrace ==
   at System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize(XmlReader xmlReader, String encodingStyle, Object events)
   at System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize(TextReader textReader)
   at Rawr.Character.LoadFromXml(String xml)
 
== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
Remove the space in "Night Elf" to change it to "NightElf". This appears to work.

Comments.Message: Fixed with Commit 56324 earlier this week, just waiting for next release.
